methods.name: OperatorProperties
methods.logic: Deleted copy constructor.  Prevents copying of OperatorProperties objects.

methods.name: operator=
methods.logic: Deleted assignment operator. Prevents assignment of OperatorProperties objects.

methods.name: HasContextInput
methods.logic: Determines if the operator has a context input.

methods.name: GetContextInputCount
methods.logic: Returns 1 if the operator has a context input, 0 otherwise.

methods.name: NeedsExactContext
methods.logic: Determines if the operator needs an exact context.

methods.name: HasFrameStateInput
methods.logic: Determines if the operator has a frame state input.

methods.name: GetFrameStateInputCount
methods.logic: Returns 1 if the operator has a frame state input, 0 otherwise.

methods.name: GetTotalInputCount
methods.logic: Returns the total number of inputs for the operator.

methods.name: IsBasicBlockBegin
methods.logic: Determines if the operator represents the beginning of a basic block.
